item.title: Envoy Control Plane API Server Testing
item.description: SNAPSHOT // Snapshot is an internally consistent snapshot of xDS resources. // Consistentcy is important for the convergence as different resource types // from the snapshot may be delivered to the proxy in arbitrary order. type Snapshot struct { // Endpoints are items in the EDS response payload. Endpoints Resources // Clusters are items in the CDS response payload. Clusters Resources // Routes are items in the RDS response payload.
